attributes.action: Stop UK foreign aid going to Uganda
attributes.additional_details: The Ugandan parliament just past a law that prohibits any person from identifying as part of the LGBTQ+ community. We send 10s of millions in aid to this government and we should stop doing so until they repeal this law. It’s bad enough they already imprison/execute their people for consensual acts between adults in the privacy of their own home, they now intend to do the same just for being something that can’t be changed!
attributes.background: All foreign aid should be withheld from the Ugandan government in response to passing new laws concerning LGBTQ+ people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635322
